name: Bright Bob
description: Bright Bob - a Fascinating and colorful game of skill and reaction, Bob only has time to blink :)
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9800 GT Storage: 200 MB available space
